title: Moment ‘Cryptoqueen’ scammer with £5bn Bitcoin stash arrested in bed
description: A “Crypto queen” fraudster who masterminded a scam that led UK police to seize more than £5.5bn in Bitcoin was arrested in bed, police bodycam video shows.

title: China Accuses United States of $13 Billion Bitcoin Mining Pool Hack
description: Some in the crypto community are skeptical.
